Class RexDatabaseUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs115.rex.RexDatabaseUtilities

  • public class RexDatabaseUtilities
extends Object
    Helper class that provides database access utility methods.

      • getSelectedFoodList

        public static android.database.Cursor getSelectedFoodList(android.content.Context context,
                                                          String searchName)
        get a cursor with the ids and names of the foods whose names start with the user input search string to populate the results list fragment
        Parameters:
        context - this context
        searchName - the user input search string
        Returns:
        a Cursor containing the ids and names of all of the food table items that start with the search string

      • getSelectedFoodNames

        public static String[] getSelectedFoodNames(android.content.Context context,
                                            String searchName)
        get a string array of all of the foods that match the given query to check for the presence of search results
        Parameters:
        context - this context
        searchName - the user-inputted search string
        Returns:
        String array containing the ids and names of all of the database items that start with the search string

      • getFoodById

        public static android.database.Cursor getFoodById(android.content.Context context,
                                                  long itemId)
        get all of the database data for a particular food given that food's database id from the results list fragment
        Parameters:
        context - this context
        itemId - the database id of the item whose data will be retrieved
        Returns:
        a Cursor containing all of the food table database data that matches the provided itemId

      • addAllergy

        public static int addAllergy(android.content.Context context,
                             int foodId,
                             int dogId)
        Adds specified allergy with associated dog to allergy table.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        foodId - specifies what food to add to allergy table in association with specific dog
        dogId - specifying what food with what specific dog to add to allergy table
        Returns:
        ID of allergy that was added

      • removeAllergy

        public static boolean removeAllergy(android.content.Context context,
                                    int foodId,
                                    int dogId)
        Removes specified allergy with associated dog from allergy table.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        foodId - specifies what food to remove from allergy table in association with a specific dog
        dogId - specifying what food with what specific dog to remove from allergy table
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
